row: It can provide the Central Blood Bank Society in Gaza with 16 blood bags. Blood bags are a vital element in ensuring patient survival during a crisis.
These kits include hand soap, shampoo, toilet paper, laundry detergent, toothpaste, and more
🥫 $100: food parcel for a family of 4 for 7-10 days.
Feed one displaced family with a food parcel that will meet their nutritional needs for 7-10 days, include canned tuna, cheese, kidney beans, jam, za'atar, and more.
